ygData.subject: Lullaby Low Priority
ygData.msgSnippet: Sometimes Verant REALLY galls me.  Check out the latest.  (Courtesy www.eqvault.com) ... which you ... have ... Seems to me plenty has been addressed that
ygData.messageBody:
Sometimes Verant REALLY galls me. Check out the latest. (Courtesy
www.eqvault.com)

>[Quote from original post: As an example, where is the bard lullaby song,
which you
>said in about March would be looked at?]

>It's still on the drawing boards. We've just had so many other issues that
have
>taken precedence over the past few months.

Seems to me plenty has been addressed that aren't as critical to their
classes than the Lullaby to ours. Granted I was lower-level at the time and
had less options; but I recall (pre-nerf) lullaby being one of the main
songs on my mem list. I often even had it memmed when grouped with
enchanters in case we got hit by a train while they were OOM (again this is
pre-clarity days). Saved the groups ass so many times in the Permafrost
Flag room - I lost count. Now it's useless.

Perhaps squeaky wheel does work and we should raise a stink...

Slyde
just dinged to 45!
